news.title: China and U.S. trade officials to hold talks in London
news.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump's top trade officials are meeting with their Chinese counterparts in London on Monday for talks. U.S., Chinese trade officials to meet in London for trade talks.

news.title: Warner Bros. Discovery to split into two public companies by next year
news.summary: The move comes as consumers cut cords from their cable plans and companies focus on streaming. The move was announced on the same day the company announced its new streaming service, Netflix.

news.title: Robinhood shares drop after the online brokerage fails to get the nod to join the S&P 500
news.summary: S&P Dow Jones Indices said Friday the S&amp.;P 500 would remain unchanged. Investors were left disappointed after the announcement.

news.title: China extends an olive branch to Western auto giants over rare earth shortage
news.summary: China appears to have offered U.S. and European auto giants something of a reprieve over a rare earth shortage. China is the world's largest producer of rare earths.

news.title: Nvidia CEO says the UK is in a 'Goldilocks' moment: 'I'm going to invest here'
news.summary: "The U.K. is in a Goldilocks circumstance," Nvidia's Jensen Huang said. Huang was speaking on a panel with British Prime Minister Keir Starmer.

news.title: Warner Bros. Discovery’s rapid split shows how much cable television has declined
news.summary: The new Streaming & Studios company will include DC Studios and HBO, while Global Networks will include CNN and TNT. The new streaming company will be based in New York City.

news.title: Trump and Elon Musk’s social-media mudslinging offers a lesson for all of us
news.summary: Don’t air your dirty laundry on social media — it could cost you dearly. Don't air yourdirty laundry onsocial media. It could costYou dearly. Click here for more information.

news.title: eToro wins analyst praise for user-friendly trading, but the stock gets mixed reviews
news.summary: eToro draws two bullish ratings and a pair of neutral views. Analysts initiated overage of online brokerage firm after its IPO. eToro has been valued at $1.2 billion.

news.title: If you move to a new state or city, do you take your financial adviser with you?
news.summary: What's your best option if your adviser is making a long-distance move? And what’s your best options if you’re an adviser yourself?

news.title: A downgrade for Tesla as this Wall Street firm sees too much uncertainty on too many fronts
news.summary: Baird analysts cut Tesla to neutral from outperform, citing uncertainty tied to Musk’s politics and overly optimistic expectations for robotaxis.
